Gangon looked up weakly, he was not moving much, but the shooting of his
partner enraged him!...he lifted his hand and punched Tavatron, however, it
was about the weakest punch in the universe......an ant could probably punch
better......he realized that perhaps he should not have done that.......he
started to panic but could not move at no more than......what else? an ants
pace.....
----- Original Message -----
From: "FIRE FOX" <firefox_y2k@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, May 01, 2000 4:33 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> (Sorry I haven't been posting. I had a TON of work to do. I'm tryin to
play
> catch-up, so if any of my info contradicts with the story line let me
know.
> I had to skim through about 80 e-mails before I found the ones that
applied
> to me. Thanx!)
>
> Anix/Tavatron:
>
> Anix heard Megatron's call over her com:
>
> "On my way. We'll try and fix the speeder later (assuming Shredder is
still
> with her), right now Megatron needs us."
>
> Anix transformed to beast mode and scurried off in the direction of the
ark.
>
> ************************************
>
> Tavatron:
>
> Tavatron dropped to the ground, avoiding the majority of BrightBlades'
> shots. The last one, however, connected with her side. Tavatron clutched
her
> injured side, the smell of burning fur filled her nostrils. Sometimes her
> beast mode was really annoying! She tried to stop the flow of mech-fluid,
> her ribs, still aching from the previous battle, were now broken again.
>
> "I am not weak!" Tavatron crouched behind what remained of the boulder and
> waited until BrightBlade was at Gangon's side. She raised her head above
the
> boulder, charged her optic lasers to full power, and fired, this time
making
> sure her aim was true.
